name: Knight Dungeon: Maze Escape 3D
description:
Explore the medieval labyrinth and fight for your life!

Time travelling is the most amazing thing - you can’t even imagine! Now you are a knight, you live in medieval age. You are going to explore some strange and scary labyrinth – maybe there is a treasure, who knows? Knight Dungeon: Maze Escape 3D – medieval adventures became real!

Your goal is to find the key and to find the exit, but be careful – labyrinth keepers will be trying to stop you. Use your weapon to fight with them.

Knight Dungeon: Maze Escape 3D GAME FEATURES:
- Explore the maze, try to find a key;
- Fight with your enemies and win the battle;
- Amazing atmosphere of medieval knight’s life;
- Simple controls;
- Cool graphics and sounds.

Knight Dungeon: Maze Escape 3D welcomes you! We wish you good luck in your first joust!
